title: evening_watering_vegetables_due_to_dew_based_morning_conditions
summary: Watering vegetables in the evening; morning watering was skipped due to dew and high moisture conditions.
description: Image documents evening watering of vegetables. Morning watering was intentionally skipped because dew and high humidity indicated moist soil conditions. This record links agricultural decisions to earlier verified environmental readings and dew evidence captured in the morning of the same day.

linked_references.note: Morning environment reading referenced for moisture condition.

context_notes: Morning watering skipped due to dew/high humidity
